Title: A Whisper to Sabellian
Description:
Our assault on Brimstone Garrison will not work without Sabellian and his relentless and mighty dragons. We must convince him that our objectives are aligned.

If we appeal to him as a tactician and general, I'm sure he will help us... I hope.

We will find him with his troops at the Djaradin Assault.
ObjectivesText: Speak to Sabellian at the Djaradin Assault.
